title: Some physics classes missing from doxygen

content.raw:
Some of the physics classes are not included in the doxygen html because they are missing the `\addtogroup` statement:

~~~
$ grep -L addtogroup `grep -rlI GZ_PHYSICS_VISIBLE gazebo/physics`
gazebo/physics/AdiabaticAtmosphere.hh
gazebo/physics/AtmosphereFactory.cc
gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletPolylineShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTBallJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTBoxShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTCollision.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTCylinderShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTFixedJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTHeightmapShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTHinge2Joint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTHingeJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTMeshShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPlaneShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPolylineShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTScrewJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTSliderJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTSphereShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTUniversalJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEBallJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEBoxShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODECollision.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODECylinderShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEFixedJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEGearboxJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEHeightmapShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEHinge2Joint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEHingeJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODELink.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEMesh.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEMeshShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEMultiRayShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPhysics.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPlaneShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPolylineShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODERayShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEScrewJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODESliderJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODESphereShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEUniversalJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/PhysicsFactory.cc
gazebo/physics/simbody/SimbodyPolylineShape.hh
~~~
content.html:
Some of the physics classes are not included in the doxygen html because they are missing the \addtogroup statement:

$ grep -L addtogroup `grep -rlI GZ_PHYSICS_VISIBLE gazebo/physics`
gazebo/physics/AdiabaticAtmosphere.hh
gazebo/physics/AtmosphereFactory.cc
gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletPolylineShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTBallJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTBoxShape.hh

gazebo/physics/dart/DARTMeshShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPlaneShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPolylineShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTScrewJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTSliderJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTSphereShape.hh
gazebo/physics/dart/DARTUniversalJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEBallJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEBoxShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODECollision.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODECylinderShape.hh

gazebo/physics/ode/ODEJoint.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODELink.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEMesh.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEMeshShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEMultiRayShape.hh
gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPhysics.hh
